channel.title: Advanced Subtitle Editor on
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced Subtitle Editor on

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Full disclosure: Statistics collected by the update checker # We are aware that some of our users care a lot about their privacy. First, the short version: If you do not want to participate in anonymous data collection, do not enable the built-in update checker. If you want to know what information is collected, read on. Aegisub’s update checker function retrieves a file describing any potential updates available for your installed version of Aegisub.

item.title: Downloads
item.description: The Latest Release version is 3.4.2, released January 12, 2025 See the changelog for a list of changes. All others must be downloaded separately:
